SEARCH
Package photos.model

Class User

java.lang.Object
photos.model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a user in the photo album app. Tracks all their albums and tag types they've created.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Gets this user's login name.

    • getAlbums

      public List<Album> getAlbums()
      Gets all albums for this user. Returns a copy of the list so outside code can't mess with our data.

    • getAlbum

      public Album getAlbum(String name)
      Finds a specific album by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The album name to look for
      Returns:
      The album if found, or null if no match

    • createAlbum

      public Album createAlbum(String name)
      Makes a new album for this user.
      Parameters:
      name - What to call the new album
      Returns:
      The new album, or null if an album with this name already exists

    • deleteAlbum

      public boolean deleteAlbum(String name)
      Deletes an album.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the album to delete
      Returns:
      true if deleted, false if album wasn't found

    • renameAlbum

      public boolean renameAlbum(String oldName, String newName)
      Changes an album's name.
      Parameters:
      oldName - Current album name
      newName - New album name
      Returns:
      true if renamed, false if couldn't rename (album not found or name conflict)

    • getTagTypes

      public List<String> getTagTypes()
      Gets all tag types this user has defined.

    • addTagType

      public boolean addTagType(String tagType)
      Adds a new custom tag type.
      Parameters:
      tagType - The tag type to add
      Returns:
      true if added, false if it already exists
